reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Carter explains complex concepts well but can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Great professor! His classes are engaging and informative.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but the lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about history and makes the class very interesting.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: The material is difficult, and her teaching style doesn't help much.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful lectures, though the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is amazing! She cares about her students and the subject.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Decent professor, but his lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Her classes are interesting, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Engages students in deep discussions and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting material, but the lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor! Makes complex topics accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Moore is knowledgeable, but sometimes hard to understand.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Solid professor, but not very approachable outside of class.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow his lectures, and the exams are very challenging.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Adams makes art history come alive, though the readings are extensive.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Incredible professor! His passion for music is contagious.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Challenging course with a lot of reading, but Dr. Clark is fair.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Prof. King provides real-world examples that make the material relatable.
